Text: how do u activate the serial, mine just installs and when i click upgrade it takes me to the apple store. plz help

Funkar finfint... G책 in under Redigera/Inst채llningar/Registrera och ange den bifogade registreringsinfon s책 l책ses den upp.

Tack asus3008

To activate the serial, simply unpack, install, and run quicktime. in the file dropdown, go to preferences and click the register radio button. copy and paste the user name and pass code from the .txt file and you're now a pro. good luck...
so it's actually in the edit dropdown and one just has to scroll through until s/he gets to the preferences and from there the registration. regardless, it's fairly simple, no?
To activate the serial, open the Control Panel and double click the QuickTime icon. You'll find the registration in there.

Nice up dude. Thanks. Works perfectly.

Activate under 'File -> Preferences' for the nooblets. You know where the serial is...
